name: Flyght School
description:
This is an entry for the GameDev Insiders Jam #2

(Note: All assets were created for and during the game jam!)

Art & Audio - Jordan Neff
Programming - AngelOfDreamz

It's not common knowledge that every fly in the world must first pass flyght school in order to earn their wings! You (the fly in training) must avoid deadly obstacles such as fly swatters, newspapers, and bug zappers (oh my!). Your goal: reach the juicy delicious food without being killed. So, do you think you have what it takes to pass flyght school?

Controls:
Spacebar - Mash to launch
W / Up arrow: Move up
S / Down arrow: Move down
